transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan ji sir, Mamta bol rahi hu.
Executive: Haan madam.
Customer: Aapko is number pe bhi call karenge na to mere paas hi call aata hai sir.
Customer: Customer care pe phone karte hain to phir kiske paas jaata hai?
Executive: Account manager ke, kyuki aapke account manager hi saari cheeze dekhte hain na sir. To baar baar aap bhi cheeze baar baar explain karoge dusron ko. To it's better ki woh hamare paas hi call aata hai aur maine isiliye apna number aapko de rakha hai taaki aap direct mujhse connect kar paaye.
Customer: Dusron ko explain isliye maine to pehle bhi kar chuka hu bahut baar. Jab account manager se nahi banta hai to mere ko dusron ko explain karna padta hai madam. To pehle bhi maine bahut sun raha tha.
Executive: Nahi nahi matlab aapko pareshan na ho is vajah se hota kya hai ki jo call aati hai na.
Customer: Customer care ke upar jab main phone laga raha tha pehle tab to ye kisi aur ke paas nahi jaata tha abhi aapke paas mein kaise aa raha hai?
Executive: Change ho gaya kya?
Executive: Nahi aisa nahi hota hai sir. Woh hamare paas hi call aata hai sir.
Executive: Hamare paas hi aata hai sir. Hmm, bataiye sir. Woh aapne mujhe bataya tha us time pe maine escalate kiya hai sir. Haan maine mail dala hai sir ki aap udhar se revert aayega to main khud aapko update dene wali thi na sir.
Customer: Madam dekhiye main aapko ye bol raha hu kyuki abhi iske andar aapke retail buyleads hi aa rahi hai mere paas mein. 10 liter, 5 liter kuch kuch log iske andar nahi iske andar quantity bhi nahi dalte. Ab mere ko to dekho baar baar samay hai nahi ki main har waqt aap account manager ko phone karke itna itna batata rahu same cheez.
Executive: Nahi to usme aap not relevant less than order value jo aapka option hai. Madam phir isko karu kya use usko? Aapne jo mere ko buyleads di hai main har kisi ko non relevant meri baat suniye. Non relevant mein aapne jaise pehle bhi mere ko bataya tha aage ke jo account manager sir GST verified wali use karo main GST verified wali use karta hu. Ab wo GST ki verification jab kuch us pe aa hi nahi raha hai to main kya use karu phir meri wo buyleads jo hai wo lapse ho jayegi ya to usko main hone du.
Executive: Nahi nahi lapse kyu karna sir dekho. Main aapki baat se bhi agree kar rahi hu.
Customer: Dikh nahi raha hai. Jo aapke paas buyleads hai us pe maine jaake I am interested I am interested wo sabko main kar raha hu uske andar. Iske andar koi danka to dikhna chahiye na mere ko.
Executive: Sir lead jo aa rahi hai abhi jaise aaj aapne do lead. Aaj aapne do lead consume kari hai sir. Haan. Hai na? Ji aur retail ka lead hai sir retail ka lead hum band nahi kar sakte hain sir. Aap samajhiye. Madam band nahi kar sakte retail ka lead aap band nahi kar sakte. Nahi kam se kam maine jis purpose ke liye IndiaMART agar khulwaya hai to mere ko wo to cheez milni chahiye nahi to isko band kar do. Main aap se yahi kehna hai koi baat nahi mere jo payment ho rakha hai uska koi nahi usme nahi chahiye isko services ko aap band kar dijiye. Ye seedhi si baat hoti hai. Sir abhi tak aap achcha feedback ke liye main bhi nahi lena chahta hu. Hmm hmm. Madam achcha feedback agar kaam danka hoga to main karunga na uske andar. Dekhiye pichle mahine bhi mera koi danka nahi hua. Maine sirf aapko jo ye pichla mahina nahi pichle mahine se pichle mahine bhi kuch danka nahi hua. October ke andar starting mein aapne mere ko phone kara tha usme mere ko maine aapko bola tha madam ha thode bahut isme aaya uske bahar ka to kuch bhi nahi raha. Aur abhi tak wo same cheez repeat ho rahi hai. To ye 30 45 din kuch nahi hoga to phir iska kya matlab reh jaata hai aap khud dekhiye na. Nahi aap itna mat pareshan ho sir. Dekhiye business hai sir thode utar chadhap to hote rehte hain sir. Hai na? Aisa thodi hai ki business mil nahi raha hai abhi thoda beech mein aapko thoda problem aa raha hai sir requirement thoda retail wala aa raha hai baki usse pehle bhi aapne business kiya hai sir aur aage bhi aapko business milega. Business nahi milta to sir service hum dete hi kyu sir aapko right hum to aapka experience kharab nahi karna chahenge sir apne sath. Aap khud dobara aap aaye hain ek trust basis pe hi to aaye hain sir. To hum to chahenge na ki aapko achcha se achcha business dilaye sir. Aur baki help vagaira ka kuch rehta hai to main to hu hi na sir. Main to khud hi time se pehle aapko call kar leti hu sir ki kuch issue to nahi aa raha aapne us time pe problem bataya phir maine usko escalate kiya hai maine bola tha jaise hi kuch aayega main aapko revert karungi sir. Baki sir ye jo not relevant wala option hai na wo maine isliye bataya tha kyuki backend mein na feedback jaata hai ki aapko is type ka lead jo hai nahi chahiye to wo cheez karna thoda shuru kariye sir. Iska ye aapka option isiliye diya gaya hai sir. Main aapko ek seedhi bhasha mein main aapko samjhana chahta hu dekhiye main is pe lagbhag do teen saal mere ko ho gaye hain aapne jo bhi mere ko baat batai hai wo sab baatein mere ko pehle se pata hai. Non relevant karne se kya hota hai kya karenge. Janti hu sir naye client thodi hai aap. Haan to ye cheeze madam mere ko mat batao aap baar baar har koi aata hai koi cheez gyan deke jaata hai. Main aapko kuch alag cheez to nahi bataungi na wo kaam se related cheez nahi to bataungi na. Main wahi to bata raha hu ki wo sab cheeze to ho rahi hai. Fir bhi har baar aisa kyu hota hai ki thoda bahut kuch business milne ke baad mein bhi phir ye is tarike se ho jaata hai to wo jo business mila hua hai wo bhi koi kaam ka nahi reh raha hai na. Ye baat aap kyu nahi samajh paate ho. Mera sirf aap se itna sa hai ab main baar baar aapko call nahi karunga nahi to isme seedha band karwaunga. Mera manufacturing unit hai mere ko kuch agar aap bulk bulk bhi main aap se 1000 2000 liter nahi mangta utna is pe aata nahi hai kam se kam kuch 50 100 liter to kuch iske upar aana chahiye na taaki hum capable rahe factory se nikalne ke liye ab ye pura hi pura 5 liter 1 liter 200 ml is tarike ki buylead aa rahi hai usko bhi hum in relevant karte hain non relevant karte hain waha niche aapke option aata hai ki usme aap likh sakte ho ab itna to likh diya hai humne uske andar. Nahi not relevant last one month se use nahi hua hai sir aapko maine ek screenshot bheja hai aap ek baar dekhiye sir. Main bhi usko check kar leta hu. 500 liter wala kaam ka hai sir? Abhi aaya hua hai iske andar? Haan ji haan ji haan ji ek baar apna portal open kariye 5 minute pehle hi aaya sir. Ye dekhiye main screenshot bhej rahi hu sir. Ab aap khud hi dekh lijiye madam isko aap buylead bol rahe hain main phone karke iski aapko recording suna dunga ek mahine ek isne requirement dali hai requirement abhi tak iski aur iska sirf phone ke upar mark hai. Jahan tak mera experience hai mere ko nahi lagta hai main abhi isse baat karke aapko hatho hath response de deta hu ki kya hai ye. Hmm aise baat karke aap apne experience ko bata sakta hu. Ye main apne experience se aapko bata sakta hu. Sir dekhiye.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is receiving retail buyleads only.

- Quantity not specified in some buyleads.

- Wants leads of at least 50-100 liters.

- Wants to close the subscription if issue persists.



Resolution:

- Executive explained how to use 'not relevant' option.

- Executive mentioned retail leads cannot be stopped.

- Executive shared a screenshot of 500-liter lead.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will check the screenshot.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, retail, subscription, refund, not relevant
